MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA6 postcode area of Ayr. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:00pm to make a safe repair on our overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:35pm on 26th October 2020.
